segments.text: Lily ! Why aren't you up and ready for school ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't feel so good , Mom .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Lily , if you're acting sick just because you want to play hooky ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that's a nasty cough . Let me feel your head . You're on fire !
segments.speaker: S1
